name: Better Than Sin Cake
steps: Prepare one Devils Food Cake. Poke lots of holes over the top. Set aside.
Mix sweetened condensed milk and caramel in sauce pan on stove until heated through and well blended
Crush 3 SKOR bars. Sprinkle the cake with half of the SKOR bar.
Refrigerate until serving, then top with Cool Whip and sprinkle the rest of the SKOR bar on top.
This works in most types of pans (bundt, 8X10, or a jelly roll pan)
